source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 	
AcctCode,
	AcctName,
	U_PORF_Dep  OverCode,
	U_PORF_Alloc OverCode2, 
    [U_PORF] ,
case when GroupMask= 1 then GroupMask End GroupMask ,
	DB_NAME() AS DB_NAME 
FROM [dbo].OACT

WHERE 
  [U_PORF]='Y' AND 
  frozenFor ='N' 
  AND Levels='4'

select 	
AcctCode,

	U_PORF_Alloc OverCode2,

case when GroupMask= 1 then GroupMask End GroupMask ,
	DB_NAME() AS DB_NAME
